content: crochet yourself a travel buddy the pocket pals are worked up in dk 3 weight yarn and a 2 75mm hook and measure an approx 2 inches/5 cm tall you can use any weight yarn and corresponding hook size though but the finished size of the piece will vary accordingly pocket pals are an adventurous-beginner friendly pattern requiring basic crochet stitches splitting of legs and sewing crochet pieces together any questions about any part of this pattern just send me a message and i ll be happy to help feel free to sell a small number of pocket pals online at craft fairs etc i just ask for a credit as the pattern designer many thanks thank you for taking a look at the pocket pals
